description: Casey Williams is tired of doing all the housework while Jake Andrews is doing all the house guests so he throws down his mop and makes a very aggressive move on the gardener (Eric Moreno) through an open window. Moreno wastes no time getting upstairs to receive some deep- throat action from cock-hungry Williams. For a little guy, Moreno sure has a huge cock and fucks Williams with it like the biggest top out there! Williams ain't complaining when Moreno pulls out and they drain their nuts all over his freshly waxed floor!
title: Friction, Scene #03
